HoursOfOperationTimeSlice.description: The start time or end time for an hours of operation.

HoursOfOperationConfig.description: Contains information about the hours of operation.

Day.description: The day that the hours of operation applies to.

StartTime.description: The start time that your contact center opens.

EndTime.description: The end time that your contact center closes.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is maximum of 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

InstanceArn.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance.

Name.description: The name of the hours of operation.

Description.description: The description of the hours of operation.

TimeZone.description: The time zone of the hours of operation.

Config.description: Configuration information for the hours of operation: day, start time, and end time.

HoursOfOperationArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the hours of operation.
